content.detailedDescription: To be submitter at a later date
content.summary: To be submitter at a later date

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the balcony and noticed an object in the sky that looked like a balloon but it was bright red. (the sun was setting) it appeared over los angeles city hall and moved slowly in a north and westerly direction for several minutes. 

it was at one point directly overhead and seemed to be slowly turning in a circular motion where it sometimes looked like a cigar and other times like a "v". 

it appeared to have some kind of ���aurora��� around it. i took a picture when a plane crossed near it but all you can see is a speck of the plane but there is an odd ���orb��� about where the object was. not the color red, but like a ���light spot��� in the picture. i will try to look closer at the picture but ultimately it does not show much of anything. 

after several minutes of watching it overhead my neck was sore from looking directly up.

a few moments later i noticed it again rather far away based on its earlier speed of travel, very slow. it was in the far distance headed east. there were no lights on the object and as the sun was setting more it was obvious that the other air traffic had lights on.

at that point i saw 2 military helicopters fly in the same general area and then several minutes later they hovered over la city hall, about the location of the initial sighting. (they do this on occasion for drills but the timing of this seemed too perfect). 

during the course of all this i noticed 2, possibly 3 commercial jets fly in the general area and one private plane. (the commercial jets do not usually take this flight path to my knowledge and i have lived where i live for 10 years).

i am not sure what it was, not saying it was a ufo. first thought it was a balloon but after the timing of the military choppers and strange change in air traffic i though it might be good to report to see if anyone else saw anything. it would be interesting to hear if so!

i prefer to remain unknown but you can reach me via email if you wish.

ps i am not sending in the photograph as it does not seem to show anything but also would reveal my residence and i do not wish to do this.
content.summary: Red object in sky over los angeles, shape unclear

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my friends patio on chautauqua lake.  i was cleaning up his grill when i saw a giant gold circle in the sky.  it stayed in the same place for about 30-45 sec. shining a very bright gold.  i went to get my friend and by the time we got back outside it was gone.
content.summary: Circle shaped ufo,bright gold

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my grandmother were driving home from a business trip, from saskatoon. 
we driving through the bush halfway between white fox, and choiceland. 

i noticed the northern lights through our back window, and leaned back to watch them.
while my grandmother drove, she looked out the front window to try and see them, suddenly she said, "arie, do you see that?" i looked up and saw a red, blinking light that was swirling around in circles.. probably about 500 feet up, at first i thought it was a plane or a satalite, but it was moving way to fast. the minute we noticed it, it seemed to speed up and rose up in the sky to a higher altitude, then it sped away at an amazing speed. i was amazed, we both were, we stopped the car while it was still in the sky, and i tried to get a picture of it. which failed.
content.summary: A bright red light, that swirled through the sky at an amazing speed

content.detailedDescription:
3 days ago,4-22-10 at 3am i noticed 2 ping ponging orbs in my bedroom.Thinking that someone was trying to get into my house,at first they
looked as if they were purple flashlights,but when i saw them doing the up
down,sideways to sideways,my eyes saw round objects the size of a silver
dollar,as soon as i went to get a closer look,one shot a beam of white 
light in my eye.This is during a poltergiest type experiance i've been going thru since 2004,missing items,missing time,purfume smell in house,
tiny marks on walls,mirrows,doors,car,ect.What the hell are they?All i
know is my thinking is redirecting towards the supernatual,i checked-out 
all the books,so now i got my 1st pc.
content.summary: purplish/white balls of light in my dark bedroom.

content.detailedDescription: was in the backyard on the pool deck looking at the moon/airplanes with my 6/yo daughter with our telescope as we do almost nightly. tonight the sky was clear. at 1840hrs i witnessed what at first to be a white ball with the naked eye moving slowly and silently ese towards the moons direction. i was able to locate the object with the telescope, no details were seen..Was not cylindrical in shape like a planes..No wings were noted or engine sounds. best i can give shape wise would be like a stopsign but closer to say an emerald cut stone. wife looked at the object and confirmed what myself and our daughter was looking at. no contrail was noted. after losing sight of it with the telescope we noticed a passenger jet traveling in the same direction and appeared not as bulky as the object in question. we could clearly hear the engines of the airliner as well as a contrail. telescope is 15x45 zoom kmart store telescope.We did consider that the object could have a weather balloon but not sure what it was.
content.summary: While looking at fullmoon, saw an emerald shaped object moving ese.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a park saturday morning with about twenty other people. we were waiting to pick up fruits and vege's from an awesome co-op that delivers at the park. while standing in line i saw something glint in the sky as i looked north, similar to when the sun glints off the bumper of a car. i looked up and watched it. the shiny glint started growing as it moved very slowly toward the west. i knew it wasn't an airplane because it was all silver and had no wings. when it got directly in front of me it was at least half again the size of a jumbo jet and cigar shaped (from my point of view). it stayed in that spot for about 10 secs. then disappeared. my view was unencumbered by trees, buildings or clouds. the weirdest thing was that while i'm watching this craft move slowly across the sky the lady next to me kept talking ��� but i couldn't hear the words; i couldn't move to indicate she should look up and i couldn't speak, i was frozen in place ��� only my mind was working. my husband was standing next to me as well. when the craft disappeared i was able to talk again and i asked where did it go? there was a plane right there going slowly (not able/willing to say it was a ufo). my husband and the woman indicated a black, propeller driven plane that was flying slowly heading south. i told them that wasn't it but the conversation moved on as if nothing had happened. it was about 9:20 in the morning and i was the only one that saw it.
content.summary: Silver cigar shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving just west of tilden ne,about a mile i saw on the north side of the highway over a farm,i saw a slight v shape row of white lights hovering over this farm,at the time it was raining .I could not pull my car over so i only saw it about 30 seconds,.At first i thought it to be a flock of geese ,but it was white lights and moved slightly and then remained stillover the farm.It was very awe inspiring to see this strange site,i did not feel at all frightened from the site.
content.summary: A row of white lights slight v shape

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work heading west on hwy 160 when i noticed a very bright gold object in the sky. i did not think anything of it at first and thought it was a plane. but as i kept driving and getting closer i knew from the bright glow that it was not a plane. ( i lived next to o'hare airport for 25 years) the object appeared to be on the north side of the road. it was hard to tell how high up it was ( did not appear to be very high ) or what shape the object was due to the fact of the brightness of the object. for some reason i did not pull over right a way but when i did and began looking for the object again i could not see it. there was no sound no vapor no nothing. a few days later i talked with some people i work with and one reported seeing a very bright object in the sky a few hours earlier. and the other said they saw a very bright object in the night sky moving the next day.
content.summary: Saw a very bright gold object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I am going to work and it's 10:40pm. as i am entering the freeway, 101 south from grover beach, i immediately see a big red light futher away in the distance. it gets my attention right away. i don't take my eyes off of it, trying not to have an accident. the freeway is a bit busy as it normally is on a friday evening. i get closer to it, and bring down my window just to have a better view but also to see if there is any sounds...In case it's a helicopter or something. nothing. no sound. just one huge red light hovering really low right in between the freeway and walmart and trader joe's which is on the other side. it just sits there but i cannot see anything else. the sky is so black. i am straining to see more...I also noticed that no one else seem to pay attention to this object/light at all which really surprised me. i wanted to pull over but felt it was very unsafe. i slow down as i am about to pass by it...I stick my head out the window a bit to have a better look...I see something sticking out in the back of the red light...A metallic shape..Something. i can't even describe it. underneath the red light, i am seeing something roundish in shape, but can't even make that out either. it was as if it was invisible except for the red light! very strange. still no sound, no movement...No pulsing of light, nor blinking...It just sits there in the air, incredibly close to the ground....I'd say just a little bit higher than the street lights that are by the freeway. by now i have passed it, i look back at it, and see a white light, but nothing else. i can still see it in the side view mirror.

a few hours later at work. i look at the clock in the kitchen and it says 5am. after that it's as if it went dark. i remember nothing. i remember feeling as if i am struggling or something, i can hear something, like sounds of struggle...Then it's like i come to, and i am looking around, wondering where the hell i am, several seconds later i realize where i am, then i am really confused as to what happend as i am laying down on the floor in the hallway. my mind is a complete fog. but eventually passes and i feel fine. i am completely dumbfounded as to what happend. later on when i got home, about 2hrs later...I notice how sore my stomach is, the abdominal muscles. it gets more sore as the day progresses, including my ribs...They are tender, then the back of my arms. tricep area. the soreness lasted for 3 days.
content.summary: Huge red light hovering 101 south in grover beach

content.detailedDescription: I am responding to a report submitted from mesa, az on apr 24, 2010 regarding circling lights that merged.  i was on the fence about ufos existing until aug. 4, 2008.  at 5am i woke to get ready for work.  i made a cup of coffee and went out on the back patio to drink my coffee. we had a good rain storm the night before and the sky was still somewhat cloudy.  i looked at the trees in our yard that were to the west and something above them caught my eye.  i could normally hear the cars on apache blvd and that morning it was dead silent.  i don't know how high in the sky they were, but they were very large.  they didn't seem much higher than our 2 story house, though i knew they were.  there was one large white circular light with five smaller white circular lights rapidly circling the larger one.  then they would all merge with the larger one and bounce right back out to the circle formation and rapidly circle again.  one rotation around the larger one and then they would merge again. i was quite frightened and felt that there was something behind me but nothing was there.  i guess my imagination was getting the best of me.  i grabbed my cell phone and called my husband who was already at work. we stayed on the phone for about 15 minutes and he told me i better get ready for work.  he worked in phoenix and looked at the sky there but didn't see anything.  after ending the call i couldn't pull myself away to get dressed for work.  i got my camera but nothing showed on the camera.  about 15-20 minutes later i called him again because they were still there but now after they merged and went out in a circle, a sixth smaller circle shot out and disappeared after it was away from the moving circle of lights.  i stayed outside for almost an hour watching it then had to get dressed for work.  before i left the house i went out back again and it was still there.  low dark clouds were starting to form for another storm.  as i watched the clouds go below the lights, they were blocked out from the clouds.  that made me realize i was looking at something that was lighting the sky from above not below.  ever since then i have been searching for someone to have a sighting like the one i had.  it amazed me that someone else reported the same thing 2 years later in the same state and city that i had resided in.
content.summary: 1 lg circle w/5 smaller circling then merging with lg circle then circling again

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i took a trip up north to cambria. we entered the town cayucos (next to morro bay) and i am looking to the right of me where there are houses next to the green hills. i immediately spot a craft flying extremely low and very very slow. it was "cruising" ever so slowly over where the cows were grazing. it had a big red light blinking every 2 seconds. i knew right away it was a ufo and asked my partner to hurry and get closer. he gets off the main road and manages to find a dirt dead end street right below the hills where the craft is still cruising. i run out of the car getting as close as i can. my partner is watching this as well, along with our 4 year old daughter. the 2 year old one is sleeping in the car. i could clearly see that this craft was round in shape, silver metallic in color, and a part of it spun counter clockwise at the same time something brownish or darkish spun the opposite way. once it has spun a full circle, a big red light would blink approximately every 2 seconds. the craft is going at a very slow pace and starts moving further away, at the same time elevating higher....We keep watching it the entire time until we barely could make it out, except for the red blinking light. a huge airplane is coming going north, then two others are coming right after...And the this craft elevates even higher and goes right underneath the planes. we can no longer see it and decide to continue our trip.

i want to add that a couple of minutes into observing the craft, i started to see some glittery interesting little "things" in the air. millions of them, they convered the air, the atmosphere...As i was watching it wondering what in the world...? my partner speaks up saying; i am also seeing these little white glowing wormlike things all over the air. we both described them the same way. he also said he got a shockingly powerful headache just like that, along with a icy feeling in his forehead. i felt fine, except being high with excitement and adrenaline rush. later on a headache crept in, along with an extreme back soreness, as if i had worked out like mad or something. i am still sore today. the day after. the inside of my left elbow also became extremely sore and sensitive to touch, along with a slight bruise on the back of my arm which wasn't there before.

one more thing to add, which i also report separately is that on april 5th at 10:40pm, i saw a huge red light hovering close to the freeway. it was silent, did not move and the red light did not pulse or blink. later on i lost consciousness at work...Woke up somewhere else on the floor with extreme soreness in my abdominals...I will fill in a report on it.
content.summary: Ufo slowly cruising the hills in cayucos

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were walking up to greater trumps on hawthorne street in portland or. as we approached, 8 people or so were standing out front pointing up-looking up. i looked too. didn't see anything at first because it had no lighting. then i saw it. 

it appeared to be flying at about 35,000 feet toward the north east-as if heading to central canada. it was not lit up like or satelite/not in outter space. 

it appeared to be round in shape,or perhaps squarish. 

in comparison to a passanger jet at 35,000 feet, it's size was equivelant to maybe 5 passanger jets side by side and 5 passanger jets head to tale long. 

no quick wavering but it did seem to turn gently to the immediate north. 

several folks reported seeing a red light on top of it as it approached but over head-silent, and without light. moon was nearly full and out, which helped a little. the objected almost seemed to have a white underside.

cool-i actually got to see something weird and saw it with several others.
content.summary: Roundish (very large) object flying at about 35,000 ft over portland or-many witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
My observations were made from the parking lot in front of tj maxx store in the target shopping center on the west side of bald hill road (rte 2), in warwick, ri on april 24, 2010 at 3 pm.  sky condition was 35% scattered thin cirrus clouds (wide bands similar in shape to jet contrails) in a transparent blue sky.  temperature was about 70 deg f.

i was sitting in my car looking in an easterly direction with sunroof open, due to the heating from the bright sun.  i was waiting for my wife while she was shopping at the maxx.  to pass the time while eating my apple snack i started to watch jet planes high overhead (approx 15,000) as they were making a beeline to and from boston's logan airport.  i watched several of the northbound jets and at one time i noticed what i first thought was a white jet at a higher altitude traveling southeasterly (diagonally) across the apparent path of a boston bound jet.  i then noticed 3-4 of these small white winged objects and concluded they must be seagulls soaring high above warwick, which is not uncommon for this city of 100,000 +/- on narragansett bay.  anyway, i watched another jet continuing along the same "to boston" trajectory and then noticed a intensely bright, white, circular object in a northeasterly direction and approximately 70 degrees above the horizon.  i thought it funny that it just hung in that position for many minutes, but it was lazily moving extremely slowly generally in a figure-eight pattern, which i verified by lining the object up with the edge of my car door jamb. as far as i could tell, the object did not vary in brightness, color or shape during my total observation.  it was brighter than a daytime observation of the planet venus and it definitely exhibited a diameter (disclike).  i did have the distinct impression that it was spherical but without the aide of optics i was unsure.

after several minutes of watching the object at the initial altitude, it started to drift slowly in a nearly straight path to the northeast --- my tall vertical light stanchion was my reference to determine this, for sure.  i continued watching until the object met a cirrus cloud and then i lost it at about 40 degrees above the horizon.  at last sight, the diameter of the object did appear to shrink a little bit, but the brightness did not.  my sighting lasted apporximately 25 minutes and, unfortunately, ended about 10 minutes before my wife returned from shopping...I was hoping i could show this to her to get her impressions.

after i spotted the object i wondered what it could be.  venus?  no, wrong position.  another plane with lights coming toward me?  no, too slow and not a pinpooint light source and planes don't wobble in an almost stationary position.  a helicopter?  no, uniformly lit and probably too high.  a weather balloon?  maybe, but strange behavior for a weather balloon.  i also initially thought it might be a daylight supernova until i examined it more intently and noticed the slight wobbling motion.

i did not think of ufo at first but i came to that conclusion as my observation went on.  it brought back a memory of the same kind of sighting i had when i was about 13 years old when one summer day i was playing in a park with the neighborhood kids, also in warwick, ri.  i have had several other sightings over the years but never reported them to anyone.  my last sighting was a few years ago when i was in florida on vacation.

i have been an amateur astronomer since a teenager and own a couple of telescopes.  i am also a ham radio operator.  i am a professional engineer (civil) licensed to practice in several states.
content.summary: Bright white circular disc observation in warwick, ri on 4/24/10

content.detailedDescription:
My bother in law called me and said that he haated to wake us up but that he had to tell us about a ufo hovering in the front of his apartment.He and his room mate had noticed it and wnet out to look, it looked as long as a foot ball field, they called 911, then they proceeded to awaken a neighbor highway patrol man, he got his camera and started taking pictures. 
"b" did not have a cmera, the police arrived and told them it was a kite. it stayed for a long period of time and was still there when they went to bed. when they awoke this morning it was gone.It would be best to contact "b" by phone after 4pm central us time he works at night.
content.summary: Ufo was in front of home looked as big as a football field.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was a child i told my mother to look up into the sky, there was a strange object there moving slowly to the right in the sky with strange colours moving around it. next day it was all over the papers that there was a ufo sghtings over the aberdeen area of scotland. soon after my sighting i was taken into an object from my bedroom. there were strange looking childreen there who i was allowed to play with. before we were allowed to move and go at unknown speeds i was given a pill to counter the forces of outer gravity and light. we moved into what was given in thought to me another dimension.
i feel stupid for saying this, but i have been abducted many times, but not in the last 9-10 yrs.
content.summary: V shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
That night at 317 am on 16 april 2010 i was woken up hearing a beeping sound, was not sure what the sound was. then i realized it kept beeping and it was not the smoke detector beeping. i sat up quickly facing my bedroom door opening. it was pitch black and could not see past my bead room door, it sounded exactly like my treadmill when it is turned on and buttons are pushed to change the settings. i could not figure out why someone would be messing with my treadmill in the middle of the night. i could feel that someone was in my house.  then i thought it was little grey aliens, for some reason it really scared me. i wanted to get up to investigate, but was frozen from fear. i had a baseball bat that i wanted to grab in the corner of my room. i was also thinking of calling the cops. my treadmill was just around the corner of my room in the living room. i can���t remember if i am envisioning this or i saw them but i keep seeing these small bluish grey aliens, 2 or 3. not clearly lit up like i was shining a light on them and they were standing at my bedroom door way. i remember looking outside my window at one point at the sky and it was a lot darker than normal as if there was a craft blocking the city lights. i do not recall seeing a space ship. i do recall that there was no other noise and it was eerily quite outside except for the noises coming from inside from my treadmill, about 3-4 minutes passed with my treadmill beeping. i had a bad feeling and my adrenaline was pumping hard. the next thing i see is a bright white type of light like lightning with a bluish color, it looked like electrical light. much brighter than a light bulb and the light had a glow to it almost as bright as observing someone welding. it was shining on my wall at a strange angle it did not completely light up the entire wall, the light was coming from my formal living room where my treadmill was. when i saw this i knew that i had to investigate the light. then a very strange sound stated, i could hear an electrical sound building up and a surge of power, then a loud sound like something left and shot off and something electrical blew up all close the same time. the light lasted about 3-4 seconds before the loud bang from the electrical sound, then the light vanished. out of the corner of my eye my blinds were open to my window facing north, i never saw any light coming from outside. when the light went out i immediately looked outside and up to the sky. it still appeared eerie dark and could not see any stars or the glow from the city lights. my first feeling was that something teleported out of my living room and then a ship shot off. second thought sounded like something electrical blew up. not sure if something flashed by or left, i grabbed my cell phone and baseball bat. i used the phones light to see me way to turn on the first light. not sure if it was the bathroom or hallway light that i turned on first. i remember banging my baseball bat on the tile floor to make some noise as i went through the house.  before i go the light turned on i had a strong feeling that i was going to see the small grey aliens. i grabbed my flashlight out of the laundry room and then immediately looked in the formal room and saw nothing. another note i smelled nothing out of the ordinary, electrical burnt or from lightning. i inspected the whole house turned on all the lights. was thinking about looking outside had a bad feeling not to go outside. i kept hearing something up in my attic or on the roof almost like footsteps. it was really freaking me out. i was hoping to find a window or door open, everything was locked and closed. i would have herd if a person had left my house. when i was going around the house i kept hearing scurrying noises inside and on the roof or attic. the whole time i was searching the house the aliens kept coming into my mind. i could sense something was still there, wanted to look on the roof and in the attic, decided that it was not a good idea.  i could sense or feel a presence and that i was being watched. i did also notice that my refrigerator was showing that the power was off for 4 minutes from 3:06 am to 3:10 (corrected). so while i was asleep my power went off just before this event. around 4:20 am when i finally got back in bed with all the lights off, the city glow was back, so it appears that a ship was hovering over my backyard blocking out the cities glow from the lights.
my thoughts for some reason when i started searching my house i was looking for grey aliens about 3.5 feet tall. they keep coming into my mind. i have always wanted to meet aliens, but for some reason i was extremely scarred, not sure why. the light and sounds from the electrical noise cannot be explained. the source of the light and the angle that it casted on my wall emanated about 2.5 ��� 3 feet off the ground in the middle of my formal living room. i have no sources of electrical items plugged in that could have emanated the light and sound. if my treadmill had started glowing it was in the wrong location.  my treadmill works fine and i have not found anything that has signs of the electrical activity going on in my living room.
i do not feel that they abducted me but, i keep having strange thoughts of seeing them and that i knew what i was looking for. i felt that they just came in my home and left. does not make any sense, i am starting to think that i am being abducted and have been the first night i saw the light, because of how out of nowhere i have a strong sense of fear for no apparent reason, like my subconscious is reacting to what has been going on to me.
at various times at night about the time i go to bed i have a sudden sense of fear the hairs stand up on my neck and my back starts to tense up, like i am being watched and i have a strong feeling that i do not want them to take me. the entire night that i am trying to sleep i am almost paralized from fear. i am now scarred when i go to bed, like they are waiting for me to fall asleep, to come and get me this has been going on the following nights from 4-16- 2010 to 4-21-2010. the fear is so bad at night, i do not even want to get up at night to go the bathroom 10 feet away.  i would love to meet aliens, but not in this manner.
content.summary: Visit from 3 greys in home teleporting

content.detailedDescription: Wow,don't know where to begin,i've seen 3 single objects at different times in my life,i had seen a formation of discs(5),i supposedly been abducted(doctor told me),i've seen ghosts,experienced the paranormal,and today am wondering why no one is looking for the truth,they say they are but it's just about the ratings.....I write to people with no response,so maybe someone can write me so i can tell my story...By the way i know ariel ships are flying in the infrared spectrum and until someone films the event,maybe even with a forward-looking infrared camera,we can finally get the truth...Please respond....I'm trying to get someone's attention....Who wants to listen.........."j"
content.summary: Story below.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of april 22, 2010 my 15 year old daughter claims to have witnessed a strange triangular object hovering in our yard. it all started when she was swinging back and forth on the swing and she noticed something in the sky off to the west. it was quite a distance away and as it began to get closer she thought possibly it was a helicopter getting ready to land in our yard but as it continued to get even closer she knew it was too small to be a helicopter. it started fom the west in an eastward direction then shifted slightly to the north and back eastward until it was over our roof and into the east side of our yard. it  suddenly remained stationary for a few seconds. she describes it as being dark, triangular shaped and thick like a rock with a metallic look to it. she said it remained for a few seconds then basically disappeared to the north. what was even more astonishing was the speed at which it departed. it was so incredibly fast that it seemed to disappear right before her eyes. immediately after her experience she came into the house and stood there with this dumbfounded look. i won't ever forget the look on her face as she was trying to tell us what she just saw, but we were oblivious as we were all laughing and arguing about something that i really don't remember at this time. she had this nervous laugh that almost seemed to be mixed with heavy breathing and panting as she was having difficulty getting any words out. and then the words came out, " i think i saw a ufo" that was when we all began to lower our voices and focus solely on her. i must admit sarcasm wanted to get the best of me initially following her comment but her laugh turned immediately into sobbing and she was so visibly shaken that i thought she was going to collapse. all i could do was go over to her and pull her into me to calm her. after she told us what happened we all went outside to see if we could see anything and by this time darkness was falling. we all witnessed approximately 4-5 aircraft in the night skies over st. clair county. i personally believe the aircrafts were from selfridge and maybe they tracked this strange object on radar. needless to say i probed my daughter with questions. i asked her if it had windows- no. i asked her if it was large enough to hold people- she didn't think so. i asked her exactly where the orange lights were located on the craft- she claimed that the corners were glowing dim and that she didn't see any direct bright lights. i wanted to know just how close this thing was and so i asked her if she thought a rock could possibly hit it if she threw one and she replied yes (omg). i also asked her if there was any type of noise coming from the object and unfortunately she had earphones on listening to music from her mp3 but she did turn off the music at some point during the encounter and with her earplugs still in, she still didn't hear any noise. i also want to mention that the entire object was rotating in an unusual manner- not just in an up & down fashion but sideways as well (at the same time). the bottom was flat, metallic and smooth and the top was thick and maybe domed shaped? it had some sort of pattern to it that she isn't very clear about but claims that it sort of resembles a rock cut in half. i am just amazed by the fact that it was that close!!! anyway, i still continue to question her.
content.summary: My 15 yr. old daughter witnessed small aircraft hovering right in our yard

content.detailedDescription:
On april 21st i was outside for a couple of minutes while at work. it was 3:30 pm. there was a clear blue sky, with some white clouds around the horizon, but it was very bright and sunny. i was looking up at the sky when i suddenly saw a white, round, short cigar shaped object moving slowly across the sky. it was in the northern direction, just above the top of a small mountain with some apartment blocks and houses on it, and slowly moving towards the top and disappeared behind it after about 15 seconds.

location was about 59���26'n 10���37'e.

first i thought 'hey a plane!' because there hadn't been any air traffic for days because of the volcano in iceland.

from what i would guess is that it flew much lower then an airplane. a little bit slower too. it was a bright white tube with rounded edges. no wings, or marks or anything on it. it flew in a perfect straight line and held a very steady speed. somehow there was something really calm about it. i don't know. i really concentrated on what i saw, and heard, but it didn't make a sound. there was no sound at all! earlier today i had heard the first plane in days, and remembered that to listen for it when i saw the object, but it was completely silent. it's a very quiet neighborhood, so there wasn't much noise at all.

i compared it to some birds as well, but it was too calm, the steady speed, and the straight line, no shaking or swinging.

i thought of a balloon too, but a balloon would've been affected by the wind and it's direction and speed would vary.

i've never seen a blimp here, and it was too small and had no propulsion of any kind as far as you could see.

i would think that it's extremely unusual for me to see a ufo in the couple of minutes that i'm outside my work in this small town here in south norway. there's nothing interesting or significant here. the chances are one in a billion i'd think... but still, it really made an impression on me and i really tried to find out what it could be while looking at it, but i really don't know what it is.
content.summary: White, short cigar shaped object moving slowly and silently across the sky at daytime.

content.detailedDescription:
i was camping with my friend his mom aunt sister and another friend.
we all seen a very big  and bright star it was bigger than any other star in the sky. as we were at the camp fire we all stared at the star in silence not even mentioning it to one another. after a good five or ten minutes of staring at it we noticed that we were surrounded by a circle of cool blue almost white light  this light stayed on for minutes wile we were frozen in silence. after a wile the light dimmed out and disappeared but as the beam of light dimmed out the star slowly shrank and disappeared with it in sequence at the same time. we all sat quiet for a wile and started talking about it in excitement and fear trying to find a logical explanation for what happened. after coming back home for a week or so my friends mother showed us a local news paper showing that there were crop circles found near by. my friends sister also said that she had a dream that we were abducted and she remembered that her brother was screaming trying to fight and that are other friend was crying and i was sleeping. this sounded true to me in the part that she said my friend chris was crying and she did not know him that well but he would be the type to cry and get scarred but did not look like it and she just met him. but her brother also told me that he thought she was lying and i am not sure if she told her mother brother and aunt the same story to or made it up to me.
content.summary: Big star shot beam of light on us

content.detailedDescription: The photo i'm submitting was taken in the sierra nevada mountains in northern california looking east. aerial object unseen at time of photo. as an avid picture taker around here, i have experienced this photographic anomaly many times. however i must say this is the clearest and most defined of such photos. as some previous such photos have shown these aerial objects to be closer to me then this one appears to be, it always blows my mind when i discover them, and wonder for a moment or two if "they" saw me taking pictures! that's about the size of it. thank you.
content.summary: Downloaded photo has aerial object

content.detailedDescription: First off, i didn't believe in u.F.O sightings prior to last night. my friend and i were sitting out front of my house on my stoop smoking a cigarette. all of a sudden i saw this thing. it was really bright, like it drew my attention to it when i wasn't even looking in that direction. it kind of appeared out of nowhere or i didn't see it come and it had a straight steady trail until it got to a certain point in the sky and then it looked as if it were just falling towards the ground. my first thought was it's a bomb (that was a dumb first impression because bombs don't light up really really bright and they don't just change their course out of no where. it was just the most possible to happen ,in my mind, at that very second), so i had an extremely panicked look on my face to the point that my friend got scared just because of the look on my face. i was telling him all about it afterward because i knew he would be one of the only people that would believe something like that. i kept saying i wish you could've seen it so i had someone else that really saw it too. then all of a sudden it came back. it was in a different location in the sky. it almost did a loop in the sky and then started to steady off on a straight path and then in the middle of the sky in my direct line of view, the u.F.O vanished into thin air. at first, i was terrified because i thought that i was about to die at any second, then after i realized that it was definitly a u.F.O, i was still kind of scared but also excited because, well, i just saw a u.F.O. i was also happy that i personally now had proof that there really are u.F.Os. i know it wasn't a satellite because it was larger, closer to earth and waaaaay to fast to be a satellite. it couldn't have been an airplane or helicopter, they are always around my house and i know what they look like very well. this sighting could not have possibly been anything other than a u.F.O
content.summary: Very bright, decently large green light with a black center that moved freely

content.detailedDescription:
At the time stated above we 1st heard two (sonic boom type) noise in the sky. shortly after the sky was a bright orange like glow. my father went to grab his lil digital camera.As he pointed the camera to the sky(facing north),and shot a video,pic's as we lookes out into the brightly lit sky we saw a formation that we had never seen in our lives."it was like they all merged together into ,one cingular shape,quickly we saw what seem like 4-6 light's ,shoot out and began to spin around in a circular motion,and the beemes of light started to move like a giant 
pin wheel". like you see in the pic's i've provided. we also have a short video but it's grainy and not that visable like the pic's.But you can see how they moved.He took these pic's and video.We are just sending you some pic's.Our live's are about to change our, perception on our existence.
content.summary: U.F.O's  over az

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside and i saw a light and looked up and saw a green u shaped object flying not to high over head. i yelled for my friends and and three seconds later a half mile away it dissapeared. it didnt fly off it just went away. it made no noise and had no flying pattern just straight. as soon as i saw it i yelled and it seemed to react to the yell and immediatly dissapeared. i was frightened and couldnt move from fear.
content.summary: I witnessed a green glowing u shaped object flying south.

content.detailedDescription: I see u say the ufo over henderson nv was "flares" from nellis a/f base.  at about 2:15 am fri morning 4/23/10 i was looking out the window unable to sleep and a huge bright light that lit the bedroom all of a sudden was overhead, and it was no flare as far as i am concerned because it went hugely fast, the time was the time it took me to say omg omg 2x it was so fast it went overhead to over the mountains.  the only time i saw a light like that was phoenix because i saw the phoenix ufo.  the standard af answer is always flares isn't it.
content.summary: Henderson nv 4/23/10 2:15 am

content.detailedDescription: Me and my freind were sitting outside in the summer relaxing talking about how vermont is good for seeing ufos because th eskys are really clear we laughed it off then we noticed a whiter orb moving slowly over the pond my freind ran into the house when i said it was a ufo then i looked to my right and a large boomerang craft was going straight down then pulled up normal again it was heading for the pond like it was following the orb like an escort it felt sared being alone outside so i ran inside either object made no sound this was my 3rd time i had seen a ufo but my first time seeing two at ounce it was really weird and scary
content.summary: One white orb followed by a boomerang craft with seven lights.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up it was about 2:30 and i looked out my window and a blue orb went across the the sky leaving a trail which later disapered in about 10 secounds
content.summary: It was a blue orb

content.detailedDescription: We were driving to the hotel we were staying at for the week and we had turned down this road that went through a feild when all of a sudden this huge triangle shaped aircraft turned and started to follow the car in front of us it was atleast a mile long it followed the car for almost a minute then shot off in the blink of the eye i never saw anything go that fast before it had four lights on the bottom of the craft three big white and one small red blinking light
content.summary: Big black triangle with four lights three white lights and one red light.
